short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Seeing your dumb friends post dumb things never made you happy. Now, it will never make you sad.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides all of the ridiculous crap your friends put on Facebook. Mouse over for a full second and it will fade back into existence.
